## Commit Message Format
<!-- Ensure your commits follow the Conventional Commits specification -->

This PR uses conventional commits for automated versioning:
- `fix:` - Patch release (bug fixes)
- `feat:` - Minor release (new features)
- `BREAKING CHANGE:` - Major release (breaking changes)

Example:
```
feat(stk-push): add support for custom callback URL

- Allow users to specify custom callback URLs
- Add validation for URL format
- Update documentation

Closes #123
```
